nodes.text: From the Darkest Way of the Force

From the Darkest Way of the Force was a book of ancient Sith Lore that was part of Darth Wyyrlok's collection. All words appeared in Aurebesh characters and were in Basic. It was written by Coqui Tanar, according to its cover.
Text on the cover says "LO[obscured]FORMITIES". Presumably, the latter is supposed to be "DEFORMITIES", which is fitting, given that Wyyrlok is looking for an answer to Darth Krayt's affliction.
